name: Alight on the Shore (demo)
description:
Alight on the Shore is a linear visual novel about mechs, their pilots, and how they choose to move on in the aftermath of a war.

This demo contains the first of three planned chapters. Expect 5-10 minutes of playtime.

Made by Andy and Diane, as an entry for NaNoRenO 2022. The storyline for Alight on the Shore was written by playing a game of Last Shooting. Sound effect samples kindly provided by Sonnis.
